content: Se ha un reclamo me lo faccia sentire. C'è una differenza tra l'obbedienza superficiale e la lealtà onesta, lo sa.
translations: eng:If you have a complaint let me hear it. There's a difference between superficial obedience and honest loyalty you know
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
